headline: Philippines (FM) Facility Management Market Share Analysis, Trends & Statistics, Growth Forecasts, 2026-2031 Featuring CBRE Philippines, Servicio Filipino, Meralco Industrial Engineering Services Corp. and More
summary: The Philippines facility management market offers opportunities driven by rising investment in public works, booming BPO demand, and sustainability reporting mandates.
